author: Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
title: How bitcoin is like a teenager
description: With the value of bitcoin in the market topping $1 trillion, longtime backers may be wiping tears from their eyes. The cryptocurrency is growing up.

title: Cryptocurrency Markets Catch Fresh Momentum, BTC Price Taps Psychological $60K Handle – Markets and Prices Bitcoin News - Bitcoin News
description: The price of bitcoin cracked a new all-time high on Saturday morning reaching $60,120 per unit at around 6:25 a.m. (ET).
